email_template.name: data_request_subscription
email_template.subject: [Ticket ID: {{ticket_id}}] Data Request from Public Sector Open Data Portal
email_template.content:
Dear {{name}},

Your request to be notified about the request for data on **{{dataset_title}}** from {{agency}} has been processed. You will be notified of any further developments via this email. Alternatively, you may search for id:{{ticket_id}} on our [Data Request page](https://data.gov.my/data-
request?ticket_id={{ticket_id}}).

Warm regards,

 ** _Public Sector Open Data Team  
Jabatan Digital Negara, Kementerian Digital_**

email_template.name: data_request_subscription
email_template.subject: [Tiket ID: {{ticket_id}}] Permohonan Set Data dari Portal Data Terbuka Sektor Awam
email_template.content:
Salam sejahtera {{name}},

Permohonan anda untuk menerima notifikasi bagi permohonan data mengenai **{{dataset_title}}** daripada {{agency}} telah diproses. Anda akan menerima notifikasi tentang perkembangan tiket ini melalui emel ini. Sebagai alternatif, anda boleh mencari id:{{ticket_id}} di [halaman Permintaan Data](https://data.gov.my/ms-MY/data-request?ticket_id={{ticket_id}}) kami.

Sekian, terima kasih.

**_Admin Portal Data Terbuka Sektor Awam  
Jabatan Digital Negara, Kementerian Digital_**
